answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Hi Alma,
Thanks for your question. Fairfield, Connecticut has given its animal control officers tasers to protect themselves with. Here's a link to the article:
http://www.fox19.com/story/17388110/town-arms-animal-control-officers-with-tasers
And here is a link to Fairfield's Animal Control website:
http://fpdct.com/site/special-services/animal-control.html
Additionally, this article discusses Taser's release of the new taser designed for use by animal control, and the company's guidelines for the use of the new taser. 
http://www.abc15.com/dpp/news/region_northeast_valley/scottsdale/taser-to-sell-weapon-for-animal-control
I hope this helps. Please let us know if you need any more information.
Max Moline
Knowledge Network Intern
ICMA
